name: Captivate Theme File
summary: Learn about .CPTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Each project has a default theme but you can change it to another preloaded theme or customize it to look the way you want. Each theme consists of a minimum of seven master slides, object styles, recording defaults, and skin and TOC settings.
To create a CPTM theme file for sharing with other projects, select Themes â†’ Save Theme or Save Theme As....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
